page.title: 07A Teacher's Day
page.content: I get up at 6.30a.m. wash and prepare breakfast for my family. At 7.10 a.m. I tidy the kitchen, make beds and pack my school bag. From 7.45-8.05 I drive the seven miles to school in my mini car.I prepare the classroom for the morning's work and talk with some of the 30 eleven year old children in my class.After teaching for the morning with a 15 minute play-time duty I break from 12.00-1.10pm,and use this time to tidy up,talk with the children and eat my lunch.1.10 to 3.30 I teach with a 15 minute duty break.After school I tidy my desk,put up displays and check the days work.At 4.20pm I leave school arriving home at 4.45pm I prepare a meal for my family at 5.30, eat and wash-up.I do the housework prepare lessons and mark books until about 10.00 pm. I watch T.V.or read until 11.00 and go to bed.
